abstract: China will place a moratorium on capital raising by real estate firms as part of a broader campaign to rein in property price rises, state media reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.
snippet: China will place a moratorium on capital raising by real estate firms as part of a broader campaign to rein in property price rises, state media reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.
lead_paragraph: China will place a moratorium on capital-raising by real estate firms as part of a broader campaign to rein in property price rises, state media reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.

headline.main: China Said to Block Real Estate Fund-Raising

abstract: Sinopec will carry out China’s biggest ever exchange-listed corporate debt issue when it sells up to $2.93 billion worth of bonds on the Shanghai Stock Exchange next month, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Sinopec will carry out China’s biggest ever exchange-listed corporate debt issue when it sells up to $2.93 billion worth of bonds on the Shanghai Stock Exchange next month, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Sinopec will carry out China’s biggest exchange-listed corporate debt issue when it sells up to $2.93 billion in bonds on the Shanghai Stock Exchange next month.

headline.main: Sinopec to Sell Nearly $3 Billion in Bonds
